metadata.title: CVE-2021-30661 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. This issue is fixed in Safari 14.1, iOS 12.5.3, iOS 14.5 and iPadOS 14.5, watchOS 7.4, tvOS 14.5, macOS Big Sur 11.3. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited..

notes.note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30.3-1').
wpewebkit package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
